TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WebHeaderCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class WebHeaderCollection Inherits NameValueCollection Implements ISerializable
type WebHeaderCollection = class inherit NameValueCollection interface ISerializable

summary.span: 包含与请求或响应关联的协议标头。

span.span: Contains protocol headers associated with a request or response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通常通过访问或。The class is generally accessed through or . 一些常见标头被视为受限制的目录并且可直接通过 API (如`Content-Type`) 或由系统保护，不能更改。Some common headers are considered restricted and are either exposed directly by the API (such as `Content-Type`) or protected by the system and cannot be changed. 受限制的标头是：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 连接Connection - 内容长度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 期望Expect - HostHost - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 范围Range - 引用站点Referer - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding - 用户代理User-Agent - Proxy-ConnectionProxy-Connection

remarks.format: ## Remarks `header`参数必须指定"名称： 值"格式。The `header` parameter must be specified in the format "name:value". 如果集合中不存在指定的标头，则将新的标头添加到集合。If the specified header does not exist in the collection, a new header is added to the collection. 如果在指定的标头`header`集合的值部分中已存在`header`与现有值连接。If the header specified in `header` is already present in the collection, the value part of the `header` is concatenated with the existing value. ## Examples 下面的示例添加到一个名称/值对使用方法。The following example adds a name/value pair to a using the Method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将返回`true`以指示标头是受限制，而不能直接使用属性必须设置或由系统设置。The method returns `true` to indicate that a header is restricted and must be set using properties instead of directly or is set by the system. 受限制的标头是：The restricted headers are: - 接受Accept - 连接Connection - 内容长度Content-Length - Content-TypeContent-Type - 日期Date - 期望Expect - HostHost - If-Modified-SinceIf-Modified-Since - 范围Range - 引用站点Referer - Transfer-EncodingTransfer-Encoding - 用户代理User-Agent - Proxy-ConnectionProxy-Connection ## Examples 以下示例检查属性以查看禁止任何标头设置。The following example checks the property to see if any headers are prohibited from being set. summary.span: 从集合中移除指定的标头。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合中删除指定的标头。 deletes the specified header from the collection. 如果指定的标头不存在，该方法返回。If the specified header does not exist, the method returns. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来删除从标头。The following example uses the method to remove a header from the . 删除标头后，此示例将打印到屏幕以证明它已被删除的所有现有标头。After the header is removed, this example prints all existing headers to the screen to prove that it has been removed. summary.span: 将指定的标头设置为指定的值。

span.span: Sets the specified header to the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果标头中指定的标头不存在，方法将新的标头插入到标头名称/值对的列表。If the header specified in the header does not exist, the method inserts a new header into the list of header name/value pairs. 如果在指定的标头`header`已存在，`value`替换现有值。If the header specified in `header` is already present, `value` replaces the existing value.
